description:
Yuga discovers that Ranma is moving away. Ranma challenges Yuga to one final Buddyfight, and reveals his new deck and new Buddy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lost World! Kyouran Ma Ryuu Vanity Kara Destroyer!! Zenpen
Lost World! Vile Demonic Dragon, Vanity Husk Destroyer! Part 1
ロストワールド! 凶乱魔竜ヴァニティ・骸・デストロイヤー!! ―前編―
